author: Venc Dee
comment: Very good. Some tools perhaps too complicated.  Eg.  Protractor should have simple bubble level mode like in Army Knife and others. This means simple mode with big digits, readable font an hi contrast for use in heavy environment. BLACK theme useful for night measurments is missing. EXPORT is missing, though it fortunately can save results in app dir.

author: River Dweller
comment: I use my Tool Box almost everyday, especially for converting metric to English. The magnifier has an option to take a picture of what your looking at, I got a great pic of a scorpion I caught. There is so many tools in this app, you won't be disappointed!

author: Richard Gonzalez
comment: I rarely buy apps because there's always a free similar version but nothing touches the pro toolbox so worth it this is one app that doesn't have an app that is free in it's league

author: Laurentiu Gavrea
comment: amazing comprehensive useful app for many things that could enhance your daily smart mob usage

author: Kakha Khmelidze
comment: Tool Box is the best for me and it has almost everything I guess I need from this class of software. I only suggest to add more categories in "Converter", add more timers in "Timer" (now there is only one timer available but sometimes we need to run two or more timers simultaneously). Also it will be great to add function to display live local time with seconds and milliseconds. I am talking about real world or local time in present. Maybe in the future we will see good currency converter in Tool Box.
title: Truly richest toolbox software studio

author: Jonathan Tornabe
comment: Very simple to use,  actually has me using tools I otherwise wouldn't. Getting more out of my 📱.the 1 tool I would ❤ to see is Thermometer,  even as an in-app purchase to Pro.
title: Great combination of tools

author: A Google User
comment: Works great..  The magnifier alone for example is only ad free available..  Add the other stuff..  Nice collection.
title: Worth it

author: Jan Reynolds
comment: Great app.
title: Tool Box

author: James Slaymaker
comment: This is an awesome all-in-one extension of my phones capabilities on a single app.
title: Good to have

author: Edwin Morales
comment: Perfect for me, please add more tools.
title: Tool Box

author: Erwin Macawili
comment: Nice app but can you include time conversion
title: Okay

author: Dan Worth
comment: the new look is fantastic, it was much needed.  I've noticed a bug that is new, sometimes the icons don't show upon app loading and the overall speed could be improved, it's a tad sluggish, 5 stars when fixed.
title: so so update

author: jackycolamix
comment: I really like the new design update ! Now the most useful app has a great interface too. Good job!
title: Great Update

author: Danny Morgan
comment: Update: reading of contacts and bookmarks has been removed... Thank you for listening. I've returned my rating to the 5-Stars it deserves.  Very helpful app with lots of useful Tools..
title: No longer Intrusive... Great app!

author: SIEW Hon Foong
comment: Can include BMI ?
title: Well done, but still has rooms...

author: Jeanette Fritsche
comment: I write few reviews but this one is worth the proverbial writing home about.  Try the free,  just ads, but it's one of the best dollars I've invested in app-land lately.
title: Where has this been?!  LoL Must have.!

author: jdb jai
comment: very simple use
title: good tool

author: Jitendra Pastaria
comment: Works great and proper. Can u write description on buttons, for level 3 time reset calibration by mistake. Tracker not working for LG l90 error GPS not connect even though otjer app able to use gps
title: Very much functional app

author: José Alexander Díaz Peña
comment: 5 star
title: Excellent

author: Patrick Denker
comment: Awesome app.

author: Ani Prakash
comment: But needs new theme looks very old sorry
title: Really nice

author: Siddhartha De
comment: If possible, I would like to see an option to move app to SD card. The app is good at what it does.
title: Fine application.

author: Les Manthe
comment: Great 'swiss army knife for your phone.
title: Exactly what it says it is.

author: Brad Hite
comment: Straight and to the point on all features. Nice
title: Simple

comment: Super.....one stop shop
title: Exc

author: Marcelo Günther
comment: I tested and I'm very happy with the free version, I now got myself the full version. Great apps
title: The best ever

author: Theo Rune Gutschmidt
comment: Please give this app a new "modern" icon, otherwise a very good app.
title: New Icon

author: Thomas Patterson
comment: I have replaced 4 or 5 apps and with this one. I have some other apps that I didn't have, but I am glad to have them.
title: Keeps Getting Better

author: Jeffrey Elzy
comment: By far the best and very much worth the 99¢.
title: Awesome Apps

author: Michael White
comment: Great app, except that the included flashlight applet locks  up my device and makes it unusable until battery is pulled and phone restarted.
title: Flashlight function locks up device, other than that A+

author: gill r Solis
comment: Great
title: Greeeat

author: Chris Hunt
comment: That is what this app should be called. It is a life saver. Cant think of 1 thing in it i don't like. The magnetic field sensor is impressive. It is well worth the price. Definite 5 star! Keep up the good work!
title: The Wonderbox..

author: Sanjay Ekbote
comment: Simply excellent. ..
title: GR8

comment: Very nice assortment of tools
title: HTC EVO 3D

author: Bryan Chance
comment: Works great. the free version does what i need but buying paid version to support dev. thanks.
